zume.options.zoom_speed.name: Zoom Speed
zume.options.zoom_speed.tooltip:
Speed for Zoom In/Out key binds & zoom scrolling (if enabled).
DEFAULT: 20
zume.options.enable_zoom_scrolling.name: Enable Zoom Scrolling
zume.options.enable_zoom_scrolling.toolt:
Allows you to zoom in and out by scrolling up and down on your mouse while zoom is active.
This will prevent you from scrolling through your hotbar while zooming if enabled.
DEFAULT: Enabled
zume.options.enable_cinematic_zoom.name: Enable Cinematic Zoom
zume.options.enable_cinematic_zoom.toolt:
Enable Cinematic Camera while zooming.
DEFAULT: Enabled
zume.options.mouse_sensitivity_floor.too:
Mouse Sensitivity will not be reduced below this amount while zoomed in.
DEFAULT: 40%
zume.options.default_zoom.name: Default Zoom
zume.options.first_person_toggle_mode.to:
If enabled, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle in first-person.
If disabled, Zoom will only be active in first-person while the keybind is held.
DEFAULT: Disabled
zume.options.third_person_toggle_mode.to:
If enabled, the Zoom keybind will act as a toggle in third-person.
If disabled, Zoom will only be active in third-person while the keybind is held.
DEFAULT: Enabled
zume.options.zoom_smoothness_ms.name: Zoom Smoothness
zume.options.zoom_smoothness_ms.tooltip:
FOV changes will be spread out over this many milliseconds.
DEFAULT: 150ms
zume.options.max_third_person_zoom_block:
Maximum third-person zoom distance (in blocks).
DEFAULT: 15 blocks
zume.options.min_third_person_zoom_block:
Minimum third-person zoom distance (in blocks).
Set to 4 blocks to mimic vanilla.
DEFAULT: 0.5 blocks
zume.options.animation_easing_exponent.t:
The exponent used for easing animations.
DEFAULT: Quartic
zume.options.zoom_easing_exponent.name: Zoom Normalizing Exponent
zume.options.zoom_easing_exponent.toolti:
The exponent used for making differences in FOV more uniform.
DEFAULT: Quadratic
zume.options.min_fov.name: Minimum FOV
zume.options.disable.name: Disable
zume.options.disable.tooltip:
If enabled, the mod will be disabled (on some platforms, key binds will still show in game options; they won't do anything if this is set to enabled).
Requires re-launch to take effect.
DEFAULT: Disabled
